entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
